mapper.insert: MERGE INTO nol_ticket_date d USING ( SELECT #{tno} AS tno, #{tdate} AS tdate FROM dual ) s ON (d.tno = s.tno AND d.tdate = s.tdate) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (tdno, tno, tdate, quantity) VALUES (nol_ticket_date_seq.NEXTVAL, s.tno, s.tdate, 1000)
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno, m.name AS memberName, t.name AS ticketName, td.tdate AS tdate, r.quantity, (r.quantity * t.price) AS totalPrice FROM nol_reserve r JOIN nol_ticket_date td ON r.tdno = td.tdno JOIN nol_ticket t ON td.tno = t.tno JOIN nol_member m ON r.id = m.id ORDER BY td.tdate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
